structure.unit: KENTUCKY ALCOHOL AND OTHER DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, AND TREATMENT LAW

law.catch_line: Report to Governor and General Assembly from cabinet.
law.text:
The cabinet shall annually submit to the Governor and the General Assembly a treatment-center evaluation report. The report shall include, but not be limited to, the following information:
An inventory of all licensed chemical dependency treatment services in Kentucky;
The information submitted by each treatment center or program pursuant to KRS 222.460 and 222.465; and
The employment, educational, and criminal history of clients in each program that received state or federal funds.
law.history: Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 10, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 504, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 254, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1990.
